settings.heading: Important Note Before Buying a MagSafe Stand
settings.content:
This MagSafe Phone Stand is designed to work only with MagSafe-compatible iPhone cases.

To ensure full magnetic strength and optimal performance, please use it with a genuine MagSafe-enabled case.

‚úÖ Buying with our MagSafe Phone Case?

Great choice! When purchased together, the finish of the phone stand (Glossy or Matte) will be automatically matched to your selected phone case ‚Äî ensuring a seamless, unified look in both texture and design.

üìù Purchasing the stand alone, or want a different finish than your case?

No problem ‚Äî just leave a note at checkout or email us after placing your order to specify your preferred finish.

For example, if your case is Glossy but you prefer a Matte stand, we‚Äôll be happy to accommodate your request!

settings.heading: Is Caseease Legit?
settings.content:
Yes ‚Äî Caseease is a trusted online phone-case brand serving shoppers in the U.S. and worldwide.

‚úî Read real customer reviews and see buyer photos on our Reviews page

settings.heading: Shipping Information
settings.content:
Order Processing:

Orders are processed within 1‚Äì3 business days. A tracking number will be provided via email once your order has been shipped.

Shipping Locations:

We ship worldwide! No matter where you are, we‚Äôll deliver to your doorstep. Shipping times may vary depending on your country.

Free Shipping:

Enjoy free shipping on all orders with 2 or more items, anywhere in the world ‚Äî no minimum spend required.

Delays:

Please note that shipping times may be delayed during holidays or due to unforeseen circumstances. We recommend placing orders early to ensure timely delivery.

Package Tracking:

Once your order is dispatched, you‚Äôll receive a tracking number to monitor your package on the carrier‚Äôs website or directly through our store.

settings.heading: Return Policy
settings.content:
Return Policy
  • Returns are accepted only if you received the wrong model or design.
  • Items must be unused, unworn, with tags, and in original packaging.
  • Proof of purchase is required.
  • Returns for other reasons (e.g., change of mind) are not accepted.
How to Return
  • Contact us at support_agent@caseease.com with your order details and reason.
  • Once approved, we will send you a return label and instructions.
  • Please return the item within 7 days of approval.
  • Unauthorized returns will not be accepted.
Refunds
  • Refunds are processed after we receive and inspect the returned item.
  • Approved refunds will be issued within 10 business days to your original payment method.
  • If you haven‚Äôt received your refund within 15 business days, please contact us.
Return Shipping Costs
  • We cover return shipping for wrong or defective items.
  • For other returns, customers pay the return shipping cost.
Refund Processing Fees
  • Refunds are subject to a non-refundable processing fee based on order status:
  • Within 2 hours of order: Free
  • Order not yet in production: $2
  • Order in production but not shipped: $3
Note
  • Orders cannot be cancelled or refunded after shipping, except for defective or incorrect items.

For full details, please refer to our complete Return & Refund Policy page.
